Author: G.Butrik
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: In fact, the ICO of this project has already ended, so this issue is no longer relevant. However, if you want to know the answer to this question, then it is the following: when you send the ETH or BTC, participating in ICO, in return you get tokens of the current Project.  Advantage is that you get them before the rest. Therefore, when a token is released to the exchange, you can put them on sale at an excellent price and thus earn on the difference between your purchase and your sale.  Plus - sometimes the token gives the opportunity to use the services of the Project when these services become available for use.

Author: Wednesdaycat
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: How do you protect these important private information? what data transmission protocol are you going to use? thanks

Author: leto.atreides
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: You upload your files(documents, copies of your ID) on an IPFS implementation over Persona blockchain. They are encypted by the blockchain itself using your private key. Let's suppose you want to sign up for a contract with a new mobile carrier. You have your identity checked on Persona blockchain. What the mobile carrier staff will do will issue a request to have read access to your details. They will generate a QR code that you scan with your phone and you'll see that X company is requesting access to your date birth, address and ID. You'll sign with your private key and give access to your uploaded documents on Persona blockchain to see if the person they have in front is the same with the person from the documents. And that's all. Every companyy that has an onboarding process they have just to make sure that the person they have in front of their eyes is the same with the person of which documents they are checking.

Author: leto.atreides
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: We just updated the website. The pre-sale starts on January 1st and ends on January 31st.

Author: thaliaand
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: Sounds interesting. Do you have any idea where will this platform be launched first?

Author: leto.atreides
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: Everywhere. The verification has two elements. The first one is a community check, where I check you and you check me (this can be done virtually everywhere in the world). The community verification can bring your verification up to 90%. For the rest on 10% depends on the area you live. For example, in Belgium, the government issues ID is a smart card(Estonia the same). If you would have a Belgian ID you could be 100% verified by inserting the smart card in your already present smart card reader. If you are in a different area, you might need to make a 1 USD/EUR transfer to verify that the name on the bank statement is the same with the one in the documents uploaded on Persona blockchain and the ID and the face of teh people that is in front of the verifier.

Author: Marahunter
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: Identity on blockchain. WHat is the difference between the persona project and civic? anything you are improving on?

Author: leto.atreides
Title: [ANN][ICO] Persona - Your Own Digital Self
Body: Persona is not a "login with facebook/civic" like. Persona is about all your details and you being in control over them. You control who has access to what details of yours. Persona is about fighting fake news or securing IoT devices, or building a reputation system. Person is about every interaction someone would have with a third party.
